file_content.text: This is Lieutenant Xak Herral... Eighty-third Platoon. It's my final duty to report... mission failure.
My squad had orders to recover... stolen Imperial data card... from resistance fighters. Recovery complete... but my men suffered extensive injuries.
Ambushed by Republic patrol... many men too injured to run. Wouldn't leave them... not to those animals.
We stood our ground... called for air support... but the enemy must have jammed our signal.
Republic scum slaughtered my men... shot the wounded where they lay... left me for dead.
The enemy stole the data card... they now possess codes to... open any Imperial security door on Balmorra.
I accept full responsibility... should have run when we had the chance....
Overheard them mention a computer at their outpost... taking the coded data card there for decryption.
If reinforcements find this message, recovery of stolen coded data card maximum priority.
Find Republic outpost... retrieve coded data card... return to Captain Labe at our forward base. He'll know... what to do....
I will see to this matter personally.
A task worthy of my talents.
Never send an Imperial to do a Sith's job, I always say.
What a pathetic failure.
The longer the Republic has that data card, the greater the risk to planetary security.
There's no time to lose.
Wonder how much that data card is worth to the Empire?
Maybe he'll pay me?
All I wanted was some loot.
Our foes will burn for this.
Lieutenant Xak Herral... signing off....
